responses.query: How much do I pay for doctor visits?
responses.response:
ChatResponse(content="I apologize, but I wasn't able to find any specific information about your physician visit costs in the available insurance documents. Insurance coverage can be quite complex, so let me try to provide some general guidance.

Typically, your costs for physician visits will depend on factors like your plan's deductible, copay, and coinsurance rates. A copay is a fixed dollar amount you pay at the time of the visit, while coinsurance is a percentage of the total cost you're responsible for.

The best way to get accurate details on your specific coverage and costs would be to contact your insurance company directly. They can look up the details of your plan and walk you through what you can expect to pay for different types of doctor appointments. Please let me know if you'd like help reaching out to them.", agent_sources=['information_retrieval'], confidence=0.9, processing_time=19.509002923965454, metadata={'config_used': {'llm_model': 'claude-3-haiku', 'request_timeout': 30.0, 'max_input_length': 10000, 'max_concurrent_requests': 10, 'default_tone': 'warm_empathetic', 'enable_tone_adaptation': True, 'min_empathy_score': 0.7, 'max_agent_outputs': 10, 'enable_content_consolidation': True, 'enable_plain_language': True, 'min_response_quality': 0.8, 'max_processing_time': 5.0, 'enable_fallback': True, 'fallback_to_original': True, 'max_retry_attempts': 2}, 'input_agent_count': 1, 'user_context_provided': True, 'llm_used': True, 'model_used': 'claude-3-haiku-20240307'})

responses.query: How do I file a claim?
responses.response:
ChatResponse(content="I apologize, but I wasn't able to find any specific information in our documents about how to file a claim. Insurance can be confusing, and the claims process is often one of the more complex parts. Let me try to provide some general guidance:

To file a claim, you'll typically need to contact your insurance company directly. They will be able to walk you through the required steps and documentation. This may involve submitting forms, providing details about the incident, and supplying any supporting evidence.

The claims process can vary depending on your specific policy, so I'd recommend reaching out to your insurance provider. They have the expertise to ensure your claim is filed correctly and guide you through any next steps. Please let me know if you need any clarification or have additional questions!", agent_sources=['information_retrieval'], confidence=0.9, processing_time=3.484323740005493, metadata={'config_used': {'llm_model': 'claude-3-haiku', 'request_timeout': 30.0, 'max_input_length': 10000, 'max_concurrent_requests': 10, 'default_tone': 'warm_empathetic', 'enable_tone_adaptation': True, 'min_empathy_score': 0.7, 'max_agent_outputs': 10, 'enable_content_consolidation': True, 'enable_plain_language': True, 'min_response_quality': 0.8, 'max_processing_time': 5.0, 'enable_fallback': True, 'fallback_to_original': True, 'max_retry_attempts': 2}, 'input_agent_count': 1, 'user_context_provided': True, 'llm_used': True, 'model_used': 'claude-3-haiku-20240307'})
